articles.title: WSJ Timiraos: Outlines debt limit impasse playbook - ForexLive
articles.description: The WSJs Timiraos, in an article outlines the 'loathsome' playbook in the event of a Debt-ceiling standoff. The expectations are that we don't get to that point but you never know.
